# r3f-jedi

This is an interactive 3D application built with React/TypeScript and React Three Fiber.
![Jedi](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/9165542/401075897-87c223b6-2a88-47d5-a2d5-6caa38aca310.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..LdEs6eB_Z02P3XH5LHdA-FbA8qKb8kn3obN1qZA5Rf0)


## Getting started

```
npm install
npm run dev
```

Hit the spacebar for leva controls and click on the Jedi to trigger an animation.

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please open an issue or submit a pull request for any enhancements or bug fixes.
